item.title: Analyzing Cryptocurrency Markets Using R
item.description: No doubt that crypto currencies with all the promises they bring, both financially and otherwise, are only here to stay. As a data scientist interested in data and numbers, I thought it would be nice to take a look at some crypto currencies with my favorite tool, R. R Libraries Below is a list of R libraries we will be using to help us with our analysis. Not all of them are necessary but they all will make our life easier.
